Question
========

In a one-peaked, symmetric distribution, the mean is

Answerlist
----------

* Greater than the mode
* Less than the median
* Equal to the mode

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Greater than the mode: Incorrect
* Less than the median: Incorrect
* Equal to the mode: Correct
